alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 25 at 4:22AM PST until December 25 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Tidal overflow flooding expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding, up to one foot above ground level, during high tides is expected in the low lying areas near bays, sloughs, and the lower reaches of the coastal rivers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Coastal Flood Advisory for Minor Tidal Overflow indicates that coastal and inland flooding of low lying areas is expected due to elevated river levels, combined with high astronomical tides. Property damage can occur, but is usually localized. Low-lying roads may be closed due to high water.
info.instruction: A Coastal Flood Advisory means that tidal overflow flooding is expected. Coastal residents in the warned area should be alert for rising water, and take appropriate action to protect life and property.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
